feedback: This course exceeded my expectations! The lessons were well-structured and the advanced topics were explained clearly. I feel much more confident in my Python skills now.
Great course with a lot of valuable content. The instructor was very knowledgeable. I would have liked a bit more hands-on exercises, though.
The course content was good, but some of the videos felt a bit rushed. More detailed examples would have been helpful.
Excellent course! I particularly enjoyed the sections on concurrency and advanced data structures. Highly recommended for anyone looking to advance their Python skills.
Very informative and well-presented. The instructor's explanations were clear and concise. A few more real-world applications would make this course perfect.
Fantastic course! As a complete beginner, I found the content easy to follow and very informative. The instructor did a great job explaining the basics.
Great introduction to Python. The lessons are well-structured and engaging. I would have appreciated a few more hands-on exercises, but overall, a solid course.
The course covers the basics well, but I felt that some topics were rushed. Additional resources for practice would be beneficial.
Excellent course for beginners! The explanations are clear and concise, and the examples are very helpful. I feel confident to move on to more advanced topics.
Very good course with detailed explanations. The instructor was very engaging. More interactive elements would have made it even better.
This course was incredibly insightful! The instructor's explanations of Flexbox and Grid were clear and easy to follow. I can now build complex layouts with confidence.
Great course with a lot of practical examples. I would have liked a few more projects to work on, but overall, it's a fantastic resource for advanced CSS techniques.
The course content is good, but some parts felt rushed. More detailed explanations and slower pacing would have helped.
Excellent course! The sections on CSS Grid were particularly useful. The instructor made complex topics easy to understand. Highly recommended for anyone looking to improve their web design skills.
Very informative and well-structured. The lessons on Flexbox were especially helpful. Some additional real-world applications would make this course perfect.
